Articles.Content:
I decided to modify a Ravenspear MK4 and this happened. The results were much, much more satisfying than a Ravenspear MK4.

There are 2 models, Speed which is focused just on travel, and Comfort which is like a party truck equipped with everything you need to go on a trip.

Both aircrafts has the potential to offer 20 minutes of non-stop flight on medium blast.

%100 percent survivability rate if all the brakes and chutes deployed in both aircrafts.

Speed Model Screenshots:

http://imgur.com/a/NDBgF

Comfort Model Screenshots:

http://imgur.com/a/dtxQG

Download Link (22 mb):

http://www53.zippyshare.com/v/54IVsYIQ/file.html

To embed images on the forums, you put[noparse] [/noparse] at the start and end of the link.

Here, I embedded them for you, in the form of an imgur album (In that case, see here)

Speed Model

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Comfort Model

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Also, I like them both, especially how the airbrakes are mounted, as well as the unique features! Keep up the good work!

Edited September 17, 2015 by Columbia
